desc: Take-n-Slide is the new medication tracker that is easy to use for your once-a-day medications and tracks your pill doses for 7 days a week. No organizers needed. Attach directly to your bottle of any size. Reusable, no batteries required. Arthritis friendly.

layout.text:
With a quick glance at your bottle, now you know
"did I take my medicine today?"
Simple, Smart, Easy, Helpful, Reusable, Affordable
